TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertySetAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class PropertySetAccessRule Inherits ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

summary.span: Die -Klasse stellt einen bestimmten Zugriffsregeltyp dar, der verwendet wird, um den Zugriff auf einen Active Directory-Domänendienste-Eigenschaftensatz zu gewähren oder zu verweigern.

span.span: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny access to an Active Directory Domain Services property set.

summary.span: Eine Liste der für die Active Directory Domain Services definierten Eigenschaftensätze finden Sie unter [Eigenschaftensätze](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/property_sets.asp) in der MSDN Library unter [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: For a list of property sets that are defined for Active Directory Domain Services, see the topic [Property Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/property_sets.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public PropertySetAccessRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess access, Guid propertySetType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess access, valuetype System.Guid propertySetType) cil managed
Public Sub New (identity As IdentityReference, type As AccessControlType, access As PropertyAccess, propertySetType As Guid)

public: PropertySetAccessRule(System::Security::Principal::IdentityReference ^ identity, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlType type, System::DirectoryServices::PropertyAccess access, Guid propertySetType);

param.name: identity
param.span: Ein -Objekt, das den Vertrauensnehmer der Zugriffsregel identifiziert.

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: Einer der -Enumerationswerte, der den Zugriffsregeltyp angibt.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

param.name: access
param.span: Einer der -Enumerationswerte, der den Eigenschaftenzugriffstyp angibt.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the property access type.

param.name: propertySetType
param.span: Die Rights-GUID des Eigenschaftensatzes, für den diese Zugriffsregel gilt.

span.span: The Rights-Guid of the property set that this access rule applies to.

param.span: In der Schemadokumentation für Active Directory Domain Services finden Sie diesbezügliche Informationen in der Zeile **Rights-GUID** auf der Referenzseite für den jeweiligen Eigenschaftensatz.

span.span: In the Active Directory Domain Services schema documentation, this information can be found in the **Rights-GUID** row on the reference page for each property set.

param.span: Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter dem Thema „Rights-GUID“ in der MSDN Library unter http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

span.span: For more information, see the topic Rights-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

param.span: Eine Liste von Eigenschaftensätzen finden Sie im Thema "Eigenschaftensätze" in der MSDN Library.

span.span: For a list of property sets, see the topic Property Sets in the MSDN Library.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, property access type, and property set identifier.
